aka: Who Can Set the Flower Bed on Fire?
trans_title: Who Can Set the Flower Bed on Fire?
introduction: SYNOPSISHyung-pyo and Shin-ae meet by chance at a nightclub. Watching news of a murder on TV, Shin-ae senses Hyung-pyo's involvement in the crime. She gets her boyfriend, Dong-min, and they start to investigate. They find out that Hyung-pyo who lives with his wife's family is involved in lecherous acts or line of work, and that his wife is disabled and unable to use her lower body. They also discover that he is having an affair with his half-sister, Yu-mi and that he forced his younger sister into an arranged marriage to get funds to set up his business. As Shin-ae and Dong-min continue to investigate Hyung-pyo's complex and intricate relationships, all the women Hyung-pyo is involved with get killed off one by one. While following Hyung-pyo, they discover that Mi-hwa, the wife, is able to walk. They suspect her of the murders but it turns out the killer is none other than the half-sister, Yu-mi.故事Hyoung - pyo和Shin Ae在夜总会见面。当有关凶杀案的消息被报道后，新爱阿姆发现情节已经涉及，并开始与男友东敏的调查。Hy lives生活在他妻子的子宫里，是一个黑人男子，他的妻子爱华发现他是一个残疾人士在他的下体残疾人。Yumi和Yumi之间的关系，他安排他的兄弟娶他的妻子带出商业资金的事实，追查了她和她妹妹之间复杂的微妙关系。跟随着Hyongpyo的Shin Ae和Dongmin，当他们看到可以走的美化的时候，对她是怀疑的，但是肇事者原来是她的半姐妹Yumi。
